data.text:
I couldn't sleep so I decided to take an early morning walk 
along the riverside. ――I knew why I couldn't sleep though.

It was because of Katsuragi Ace. 
Those piercing eyes, without an ounce of self-doubt. And――

Someday…… 
it'll be all of you chasing after my back……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
And those words. A strong, clear 
determination, and winner's mentality.

While there were many who admired Mr. C.B., 
Katsuragi Ace was overlooked.

Even with that, there was no shadow of doubt in 
her eyes. The reason I couldn't sleep……was because 
I couldn't think of anything but those eyes.

I took a deep breath. Katsuragi Ace, she didn't waver in 
the slightest when facing the words of others, unlike me.

choices.text: I wonder what her dream is……

data.text: HaaaAAAAAAA!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: Haa. Damn……like this, I won't even make it to the goal……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
But, it's not enough. I need to run, more and more and 
more……I need to pull even farther away from them……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: No matter who they are……far enough that they can't reach……!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
I followed that voice. I found Katsuragi Ace, 
just like yesterday, breathing heavily.

Hm? Did you need something? 
……Oh, that badge. A trainer from Tracen Academy?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
I nodded while looking at Katsuragi Ace. ……she was drenched 
in sweat. Was she training this early in the morning?

Heeey~, why do you keep starin'? 
Did you fall for me~?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: Hahaa, it was a joke!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
She gave off a different impression than when 
she was running. The way Katsuragi Ace was 
looking at me, gave a very casual impression.
And? Did you need something from me?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
I had called out to her unintentionally, but it 
was true there was something I wanted to ask her. 
Back then――why was she able to remain so composed.

But, this was the first time we'd talked. Asking her something 
like that seemed rude……so I was a little hesitant.

You've got a really serious look on your face. 
……is something bothering you?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Well, for now start by not looking at the ground! 
C'mon, I'll hear you out. Look me in the eyes. Okay?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Did she realize I was hesitating? 
Taking Katsuragi Ace up on her offer, I decided to ask.

Why, you ask……it's obvious isn't it? 
It's because I came here to win.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Without that, then there'd be no reason for me to leave 
my hometown and come all the way out here on my own.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Katsuragi Ace laughed it off like it was nothing. 
Then, the words and gaze she directed at the others――
I am though. More than you think.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
There's no way I wouldn't be! I'm as frustrated as anyone could be! 
To them, I'm not even worth their attention, after all.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
But you see, worrying about their opinions and 
backing away from my dream would be stupid, right?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Because I have at least that much resolve, 
I'm still standing here!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
You too, since you're a Trainer at Tracen Academy, 
even though our positions might be different, 
you've got at least that much determination, right?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
I fell silent. Even if I wanted to answer "Of course", 
I still hadn't straightened out my own feelings.

Besides, you were watching that race yesterday, right? 
C.B.'s running was something else, wasn't it!?
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Her running seems so free, and so unrestrained……! 
A run that nobody else can take hold of!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: I can understand why she's the center of attention.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
It seemed like Katsuragi Ace admired Mr. C.B. 
I wanted to nod in agreement with her words too, but――

That's exactly why, when I start thinking that someday 
she'll be the one to cross the goal behind me……
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: ……I can't help but get excited!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Katsuragi Ace let out a simple laugh. 
But her eyes burned with passion.

It was like she was looking ahead at a distant place, 
and that her path was clear――

Hahaa, that might be a little wrong! My dream lies beyond that. 
Surpassing those I admire……is just part of it.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Yeah. There's still a long road ahead though. 
If I keep running, someday I'll reach it. I'll surpass it. For sure.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: I'll turn it around. Eventually――all of it.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
I could feel the strong fire behind those eyes. 
I couldn't help but gasp.

――Oh, my bad! I need to wrap up my training. If you still want 
to talk about more, then it'll have to wait until next time.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
Don't worry about it! ……Oh. Seems like you know my name already, 
but I guess I should still introduce myself.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text: I'm Katsuragi Ace.
data.name: Katsuragi Ace

data.text:
The Uma Musume who'll surpass common sense, 
and overcome any obstacles to become the strongest Ace!
data.name: Katsuragi Ace
